name: orb-agent-mono
description: Cross-chain Agent NFT system transforming Orbs into AI Agents
author: Orb Agents Team

scripts.test: pnpm test:scripts && pnpm test:contracts && pnpm test:web
scripts.test:solana: docker compose -f docker/compose.dev.yml exec solana bash -c 'cd contracts/solana-forge && anchor test'
scripts.test:evm: docker compose -f docker/compose.dev.yml exec evm bash -c 'cd contracts/evm-receiver && forge test'
scripts.deploy:solana: docker compose -f docker/compose.dev.yml exec solana bash -c 'cd contracts/solana-forge && anchor build && anchor deploy'
scripts.deploy:evm: docker compose -f docker/compose.dev.yml exec evm bash -c 'cd contracts/evm-receiver && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --broadcast'
scripts.pipeline:full: pnpm gen:agents && pnpm upload:bundlr && pnpm publish:csv
scripts.reset: pnpm clean && pnpm install && pnpm dev:build
scripts.security:audit: pnpm audit && docker compose -f docker/compose.dev.yml exec solana bash -c 'cd contracts/solana-forge && cargo audit'
scripts.security:slither: docker compose -f docker/compose.dev.yml exec evm bash -c 'cd contracts/evm-receiver && slither .'
